channel.title: Leonardo Pacheco
channel.description: RSS feed with updates from my personal site.

item.title: Separating CK and IK, semantically
item.description: Recently, Anupam Das and Sonia Marin proved that CK and IK do not prove the same diamond-free formulas. Their proof is syntactical; here I give a simple semantical proof of this result.

item.title: Added more links and game comments.
item.description: Added some 2 new links and 2 new game comments.

item.title: Crash post on Modal Logic
item.description: I wrote a very brief introduction on Modal Logic.

item.title: Added comments on Mega Man Zero/ZX and Trails from the Zero/Trails to Azure
item.description: Added comments on Mega Man Zero/ZX and Trails from the Zero/Trails to Azure.

item.title: The Truth Lemma fails in the modal mu-calculus
item.description: We show that, in general, the Truth Lemma for the modal mu-calculus is false.

item.title: LaTeX bits
item.description: A collection of LaTeX code I find useful.
